citeinfo.origin: Auke Bay Laboratory (ABL), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA)
citeinfo.title: North Pacific Salmonid Coded Wire Tag (CWT) Database

descript.abstract:
Salmonid coded wire tag recoveries
Measurement Details CWT recovery database including data on: hatchery of origin (when present), location of tagging, location of tag recovery, weight, length, and sex of tagged fish, and vessel and fishing gear used in recovery
tag recoveries have occurred throughout the Subarctic North Pacific.
Other Comments provided by Michael Dahlberg pH: (907)789-6000
A TCODE project

idinfo.accconst: Data is available as ASCII files or hard copy and are distributed by email, diskette or mail.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
